nodes.title: Waste Minimisation Fund
nodes.intro: Focuses on accelerating a transition to a low emissions and low waste circular economy.  Goal is to reduce waste to landfill and one-off use of materials and litter.

nodes.title: Plastics Innovation Fund
nodes.intro: Supports projects that minimise plastic waste and its harm on the environment.

nodes.title: Contaminated Sites Remediation Fund
nodes.intro: Regional councils and unitary authorities can apply for funding for the remediation of contaminated sites that pose a risk to human health and the environment. This can be on behalf of landowners.

nodes.title: Environmental Legal Assistance Fund
nodes.intro: For not-for-profit groups advocating for matters of environmental public interest.

nodes.title: Strategic Science Investment Fund
nodes.intro: For strategic investment in research programmes and scientific infrastructure that have long-term beneficial impact on New Zealand’s health, economy, environment and society.

nodes.title: Envirolink scheme
nodes.intro: Funds research organisations (Crown Research Institutes, universities and some not-for-profit research associations) to provide regional councils with advice and support for research on identified environmental topics and projects.

nodes.title: Endeavour Fund
nodes.intro: For research with transformational potential across a range of economic, environmental and societal objectives, and to give effect to Mātauranga.

nodes.title: Catalyst Fund
nodes.intro: Supports activities that initiate, develop and foster collaborations which take advantage of international science and innovation for New Zealand’s benefit.

nodes.title: Sustainable Food and Fibres Futures
nodes.intro: For initiatives that could make a difference to New Zealand’s food and fibre sectors. Two categories of funding – partnerships and grants.

nodes.title: Hill Country Erosion Programme
nodes.intro: Provides leadership and targeted support to regional councils and unitary authorities, and funding support to regional erosion-control projects.

nodes.title: Greenhouse Gas Inventory Research Fund
nodes.intro: To improve the reporting of greenhouse gas emissions from agriculture, forestry, and other land use.

nodes.title: Sustainable Land Management and Climate Change
nodes.intro: To help the agriculture and forestry sectors with challenges arising from climate change.

nodes.title: Mātauranga Kura Taiao Fund
nodes.intro: Supports whānau, hapū and iwi to preserve traditional Māori knowledge and its practical use in the management of indigenous biodiversity.

nodes.title: Ngā Whenua Rāhui Fund
nodes.intro: Supports the protection of indigenous biodiversity on Māori-owned land while honouring the rights guaranteed to landowners under Te Tiriti o Waitangi.

nodes.title: DOC Community Fund - Pūtea Tautiaki Hapori
nodes.intro: Supports community-led conservation projects on public and private land.

detailList.value: Closed - email DOC re next round

nodes.title: Nature Heritage Fund
nodes.intro: Helps private landowners, local government, community groups and others protect high value ecosystems.

nodes.title: Pacific Development and Conservation Trust
nodes.intro: For conservation, cultural heritage, development and goodwill projects and activities in the Pacific where development is ongoing and affordable and communities work with iwi, hapū and whanau.

nodes.title: Lottery Community Fund
nodes.intro: Provides grants to non-profit organisations delivering community-based social services that contribute to achieving locally determined outcomes.

nodes.title: Lottery Environment and Heritage Fund
nodes.intro: For projects that help protect, conserve or care for our natural, cultural and physical heritage, or allow us to better understand and access these resources.

nodes.title: Tahua Āheinga Hapori me te Tūaotanga - Community and Volunteering Capability Fund
nodes.intro: Provides grants to not-for-profit organisations for services and projects that improve leadership and strengthen capability and capacity of the community and voluntary sector.

nodes.title:
Energy Innovation
Fund Navigator
nodes.intro: A targeted tool matching industry or innovators' needs with energy innovation solutions and funding options based on an applicants specific situation.

nodes.title: Callaghan Innovation
nodes.intro: A range of research and development funding to add scale, depth and return to research and development investment.

nodes.title: Growing for Good
nodes.intro: Helps schools take on sustainability projects with the aim of tackling climate change and encouraging the next generation of environmentalists.

nodes.title: Grassroots Fund
nodes.intro: To support group projects that help bring local communities together and make better, safer and more vibrant places to live,

nodes.title: KiwiNet
nodes.intro: To enable people who commercialise research to access the tools, connections, investment and support they need to create new products and services.

nodes.title: NEXT Foundation
nodes.intro: A strategic philanthropy fund. Focus areas include a predator free New Zealand, healthy rivers and educational leadership.

nodes.title: Match - Te Puna Taurite
nodes.intro: To help both those seeking and distributing philanthropic and grant funding. It aims to connect those with funds to those that seek them.

nodes.title: Royal Society
nodes.intro: Multiple funds, fellowships and awards/grants to support new science and research work.

nodes.title: The Lion Foundation
nodes.intro: Various types of funding for community groups and non-for-profits.

nodes.title: The Tindall Foundation
nodes.intro: For small community initiatives to larger systemic responses. Supports a wide range of outcomes for social and environmental change.

nodes.title: Environmental Education Action Fund
nodes.intro: Support schools, environmental educators and communities who, as part of their learning, are taking hands-on action to address an environmental issue.

tags.title: World Wide Fund for Nature New Zealand

detailList.value: World Wide Fund for Nature New Zealand

nodes.title: Bay Trust
nodes.intro: A community trust for the Bay of Plenty providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Community Trust Mid and South Canterbury
nodes.intro: A community trust for Canterbuy providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

tags.title: Community Trust Mid and South Canterbury

detailList.value: Community Trust Mid and South Canterbury

nodes.title: Community Trust South
nodes.intro: A community trust for Southland providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Eastern and Central Community Trust
nodes.intro: A community trust for Eastern and Central regions of the North Island providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Foundation North
nodes.intro: A community trust for Tāmaki Makaurau and Te Tai Tokerau.

nodes.title: Otago Community Trust
nodes.intro: A community trust for Otago providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Rātā Foundation
nodes.intro: A community trust focused on providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities in three South Island regions and the Chatham Islands.

nodes.title: Toi Foundation
nodes.intro: A community trust for Taranaki providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Trust Waikato
nodes.intro: A community trust for the Waikato providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Wellington Community Trust
nodes.intro: A community trust for the Wellington region providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: West Coast Community Trust
nodes.intro: A community trust for the West Coast providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.

nodes.title: Whanganui Community Foundation
nodes.intro: A community trust for the wider Whanganui region providing funding support to a range of community organisations and charities.
